channel.title: Membership
channel.description:
I have membership working,a command that gives membership, membership area,etc
but when i try to make it so new players arnt members and ordianary players are if i make them,it makes new players and peope i make members into members....help
i have a dodian source i have changed [code]playerIsMember =[/code] in player.java to [code]playerIsMember = 0[/code]
but it still dont work

item.title: Membership
item.dc:creator: @L_s_R L s R
item.description:
@L_s_R wrote:

“it makes new players”

  1. That doesn’t make sense. Explain

“and peope i make members into members”
Isn’t that what its supposed to do?

Read full topic
